name: toast
description: A template engine & template language transpiler

scripts.web: browserify -s module.exports toast-o.js > ide/toast-web.js && uglifyjs ide/toast-web.js -o ide/toast-web.min.js
scripts.parsers: pegjs grammars/dust.peg parsers/dust.js && pegjs grammars/liquid.peg parsers/liquid.js && pegjs grammars/omelet.peg parsers/omelet.js && pegjs grammars/html.peg parsers/html.js && pegjs grammars/omelet2.peg parsers/omelet2.js

author: Reid Mitchell
